Can you fix this template? 
To whom it may concern,

We certify that Mr. Ghalib Bilal is employed by the company <Company name>, registered in <City> under the number <SIRET of the company>, domiciled at <Address of the head office>, as <Title of the workstation> on a permanent contract since <Date of hiring>.

He receives a gross annual salary of <Amount> euros and works a weekly schedule of <Number of hours> hours.


Mr. Ghalib Bilal is not currently in a period of notice, dismissal or resignation or in the process of being transferred.

We ask you to believe, Madam, Sir, in the expression of our distinguished greetings.

Done at <City>, on May 23rd 2023.

Made to serve and assert what is right

<Name and first name>
<Function>
<Signature + company stamp>

To whom it may concern,

We hereby certify that Mr. Ghalib Bilal is currently employed by <Company name>, a company registered in <City> under the SIRET number <SIRET of the company>. The company is located at <Address of the head office>. Mr. Bilal holds the position of <Title of the workstation> and has been under a permanent contract since <Date of hiring>.

His gross annual salary amounts to <Amount> euros, and he works a weekly schedule of <Number of hours> hours.

We confirm that Mr. Ghalib Bilal is not currently serving a notice period, facing dismissal, resignation, or undergoing any transfer process.

We kindly request your trust, Madam/Sir, and extend our distinguished greetings.

Issued in <City> on May 23rd, 2023.

Sincerely,

<Name and first name>
<Function>
<Signature + company stamp>

Can you fill the braketed eg: <city> information with the information you find here: 
CONSULTANCY AGREEMENT
(Agreement #202104HT01)
Date: April 5, 2021
THIS AGREEMENT IS MADE BETWEEN THESE TWO PARTIES:
(1)	AltCity Impact, a Lebanese Non-Governmental Organization duly registered with the Ministry of Interior under the number 1333, having elected domicile for the purpose of this Agreement in Beirut, PO Box 11-4369 (Downtown Beirut), Beirut, Lebanon, represented by its Manager, Mr. Munir Nabti, (‘Client’),  
And
(2) 	Habib Tawk, Lebanese, ID #LR0970302, residing at the legal address (Gemayzeh, Boutros Dagher Street, Kassab Bld, Floor 4) for the purposes of this Agreement of Consultant. (‘Consultant’).
Introduction
This Agreement lays out the rights and responsibilities of each Party, hereafter referred to as Client (Party 1) and Consultant (Party 2). Bloom and Pitchworthy are affiliated initiatives of AltCity Impact, and operate under the organizational umbrella of AltCity Impact.
Points of Contact
The Client, AltCity Impact: Munir Nabti, dmn@bloom.pm, +961-3-138-770
The Consultant: Habib Tawk, habib.t.tawk@gmail.com, +961 70 707 242 
Supply of Services
The Consultant is an independent contractor and not an employee of the client, and when requested by the Client will supply the consultancy services specified in the schedule to this Agreement (‘Services’) upon the terms and conditions set out below.

To whom it may concern,

We hereby certify that Mr. Ghalib Bilal is currently employed by AltCity Impact, a Lebanese Non-Governmental Organization duly registered with the Ministry of Interior under the number 1333, having elected domicile for the purpose of this Agreement in Beirut, PO Box 11-4369 (Downtown Beirut), Beirut, Lebanon.

Mr. Bilal holds the position of <Title of the workstation> and has been under a permanent contract since <Date of hiring>.

His gross annual salary amounts to <Amount> euros, and he works a weekly schedule of <Number of hours> hours.

We confirm that Mr. Ghalib Bilal is not currently serving a notice period, facing dismissal, resignation, or undergoing any transfer process.

We kindly request your trust, Madam/Sir, and extend our distinguished greetings.

Issued in Beirut, Lebanon, on May 23rd, 2023.

Sincerely,

<Name and first name>
<Function>
<Signature + company stamp>

Bilal's salary is $30,352.00 - he's the head of Research and his contract was renewed Jan1, 2023. His weekly schedule is at 40% rate. After sincerely you can put David Munir Nabti General Manager at Alt City Impact

To whom it may concern,

We hereby certify that Mr. Ghalib Bilal is currently employed by AltCity Impact, a Lebanese Non-Governmental Organization duly registered with the Ministry of Interior under the number 1333, having elected domicile for the purpose of this Agreement in Beirut, PO Box 11-4369 (Downtown Beirut), Beirut, Lebanon.

Mr. Bilal holds the position of Head of Research and has been under a permanent contract since January 1, 2023.

His gross annual salary amounts to $30,352.00, and he works a weekly schedule at a 40% rate, equivalent to 16 hours.

We confirm that Mr. Ghalib Bilal is not currently serving a notice period, facing dismissal, resignation, or undergoing any transfer process.

We kindly request your trust, Madam/Sir, and extend our distinguished greetings.

Issued in Beirut, Lebanon, on May 23rd, 2023.

Sincerely,

David Munir Nabti
General Manager
AltCity Impact
Can you put in what that would amount to monthly in dollars?

To whom it may concern,

We hereby certify that Mr. Ghalib Bilal is currently employed by AltCity Impact, a Lebanese Non-Governmental Organization duly registered with the Ministry of Interior under the number 1333, having elected domicile for the purpose of this Agreement in Beirut, PO Box 11-4369 (Downtown Beirut), Beirut, Lebanon.

Mr. Bilal holds the position of Head of Research and has been under a permanent contract since January 1, 2023.

His gross annual salary amounts to $30,352.00, which equates to a monthly salary of approximately $2,529.33. 

He works a weekly schedule at a 40% rate, equivalent to 16 hours.

We confirm that Mr. Ghalib Bilal is not currently serving a notice period, facing dismissal, resignation, or undergoing any transfer process.

We kindly request your trust, Madam/Sir, and extend our distinguished greetings.

Issued in Beirut, Lebanon, on May 23rd, 2023.

Sincerely,

David Munir Nabti
General Manager
AltCity Impact
